Articles.Content:
If you want to just give out reputation to someone, I feel that rather than finding the first post from that user that you can, it is more productive to go through their posts in their profile page to find a rep-worthy post. For example, here's mine: Starwhip's Profile

You can then see their recent posts. Find one that is interesting, or constructive, or creative, and rep that one instead.

That is all.

+rep

Guys, we all would like some rep from time to time...

But seriously, there are plenty of rep-worthy posts that get buried in the MEGAthreads...
Can't say I ever need to do this. I rep the post not the poster, so I never find myself looking for something from a specific poster to rep.

I find I'm of much the same mind, aye.

Rather than looking for reasons (or, as it may seem to the very cynically-minded, excuses) to rep a particular person, I'll rep anything worthwhile that I come across, regardless of who posted it.

I generally do what Red Iron Crown and vexx32 do. I care more about the post in most cases than the poster. Not to say that I don't often rep the same person, it's just that when I do it's for the quality of their posts.

I'm not particularly stingy with my reputation, but I'm not excessively close with it either.

I sometimes do go out of my way to rep a particular person, especially new people.
I go crazy with giving out rep. I like to give new members rep to show them how nice our community is, as well as to others' posts whom I either agree with or really enjoy.
for me, I try to find the first post that I really like, usually, due to an idea

I do that too, I recently discovered that romfarer had only one rep bar! Only one! so i gave him rep and promoted him to two bars,
I try to give rep on birthdays, and when someone has done something above and beyond the call of awesomeness.
This wouldn't happen to be a thread you made just to get some rep eh, Starwhip????

I would like rep.

But I'm not allowed to ask for it.

HAOW U GAIN REP ON FOURMS GIB TELL NAOW!

This wouldn't happen to be a thread you made just to get some rep eh, Starwhip????

It is not. Rep seems to be carelessly flung about here in places where it shouldn't be carelessly flung about.

Swing the Reputation sticks in the Addon Releases section, or Support, or Suggestions, and not at those who ask for rep.
